# modal-overlay

Code from https://svelte.dev/examples#modal

## Usage

```svelte
<script>
  import Modal from "modal-overlay";

  let display = true;
  const close = () => {
    display = false;
  };
  const open = () => {
    display = true;
  }
</script>

{#if display}
  <Modal on:close={close}>
    <h1>modal-overlay</h1>
    <p>unnamed, single slot inside</p>
    <button on:click={close}>close</button>
  </Modal>
{/if}

<button on:click={open}>open</button>
```
